reviews.title: Clean, quiet and great for families
reviews.text: We stayed at Murphys Suites from 8/8 - 8/11. We were very impressed with the cleanliness of the room as well as the size. There were two queen beds, a TV, and a table with chairs in the main bedroom and you had room to move. There was a kitchenette area with a microwave, sink and fridge. The front room had a queen size sofa bed and a comfy oversized chair, a desk and another TV and dresser. They had two computers in the lobby with Internet service, free to use.
The pool area was nice, had a little bit of grassy area, table and chairs, lounge chairs and a good size Jacuzzi. The kids had a lot of fun playing in it. It was 3 ft to 5 ft deep.
reviews.title: Clean and comfortable

likes.liked: — Room size and triple sheets on the bed

reviews.text: The free espresso drinks in the lobby were a nice perk. The muffins and orange juice were basic, but also a nice start for the kids in the am before we headed out.
reviews.title: Bland but Clean Hotel
Very Efficient-Excellent service
reviews.text: The only downside was we were there when the hotel was not busy, so they only had one person working the front desk at any time, so you occasionally had to wait for them to return from delivering something to a room, finishing up a phone conversation, etc… but they were always very friendly.

reviews.title: A Wonderfully Maintained Hotel
reviews.text: I would definitely recommend it to others and would stay there again. The price was right for the room size and amenities.
No frills, but clean and a decent place to stay in Murphys.
reviews.title: Good value and clean.
I wouldn't stay anywhere else!
reviews.text: My husband and I are remodeling our house and have a two year old daughter. We use the Murphys Suites to get away from the chaos about once a month. Our favorite room is the Bridal Suite overlooking the swimming pool. The staff is great and the rooms are always clean. I wouldn't stay anywhere else.

Stayed for one night to attend a wedding at Ironstone. Great hotel - Friendly staff, great rate, clean spacious room, muffins and OJ delivered to the room in the morning, Oreo cookies at the front desk, free internet access on their computer in the lobby! Search no further if you need to stay in Murphys California. PS - For those traveling with kids, bring the PS2, Game Cube or portable DVD player - the TV's have rca jacks and the remote has a TV/Video button.
reviews.title: Great Stay
